EIVHTeam_bgDescID: Hides the background on the player panels
EIVHBulletstormDescID: Displays an infinite ammo symbol when bulletstorm is active.
EIVHArmorerCooldownTimerDescID: Displays the armor buff Cooldown for Armorer/Anarchist/Copycat.
EIVHArmorerCooldownTimerColorDescID: Choosa a color for the cooldown timer.
EIVHGraceCooldownTimerColorDescID: Choosa a color for the cooldown timer.
EIVHTrueammoDescID: The ammo display will be animaited when reloading or picking up ammo.
EIVHDownsDescID: Changes the way the downs are presented on the hud.
EIVHInfoboxesDescID: Display the duration of active ECM timers.
EIVHPagerJamTitleID: Only Display ECM Timers With Pager Delay
EIVHPagerJamDescID: If an ECM jammer doesn't block pagers from going off the timer won't be visible.
EIVHHideBoxDescID: Hides the background and white box edges from the timer display.
EIVHInspireDescID: Displays a timer for the inspire cooldown.
EIVHTimerXDescID: Change the horisontal position of the timer.
EIVHTimerYDescID: Change the vertical position of the timer.
EIVHBloodthirstDescID: Displays the melee damage multiplier for bloodthirst.
EIVHBloodthirstMinKillsDescID: Change how high the multiplier needs to be before it's shown on the hud.
EIVHBloodthirstXDescID:
Change the horisontal position of the timer. 
 The change will be visible next time the buff text updates up on the screen.
EIVHBloodthirstYDescID:
Change the vertical position of the timer. 
 The change will be visible next time the buff text updates up on the screen.
EIVHShowObjectivesDescID:
Choose how the objectives will be displayed 
 Extended tab stats must be enabled for the objectives to display there.
EIVHShowTimerDescID:
Choose how the heist timer will be displayed 
 Extended tab stats must be enabled for the timer to display there
EIVHShowHostagesDescID:
Choose how the hostage counter will be displayed 
 Extended tab stats must be enabled for the hostages to display there.
EIVHShowWavesDescID:
Choose how the wave counter will be displayed 
 Extended tab stats must be enabled for the waves to display there.
EIVHTabDescID: Adds additional information to the tabstats such as kills/accuracy/trade delay.
EIVHChatDescID: Makes the in-game chat less obtrusive.
EIVHGreencivDescID: Marks controlled civilians green on the hud.
EIVHScreenEffectDescID: Displays the duration of kingpin and swansong on the screen by flashing.
EIVHBagInfoDescID: Displays the bag content in the interaction text
EIVHTeamLoadoutDescID: Display throwables and Second deployables in the preplanning.
EIVHLevelDisplayDescID: Displays the rank of players joining mid-game.
EIVHSkipDialogsDescID: Remove some of the >Are you sure< messages when navigating menus.
EIVHPickCardDescID: Automatically pick a lootcard at the loot screen.
EIVHSkipXPDescID: Choose how long it will take for the automatic screen skip to activate.
EIVHSkipCardDescID: Choose how long it will take for the automatic screen skip to activate.
